name: Orange Island
detailed_description:
Orange Island is being designed and developed by Ted Sterchi as a completely authentic
8-bit experience.



  • An engaging story adventure about family, friends, hope, bravery, corruption, and our impact on the environment told via cutscenes and brief conversations
  • Five playable characters with unique magical abilities and stats
  • 8-bit graphics, audio, and gameplay authentic to the NES
  • A pastel pixel art style with numerous areas to explore
  • Engaging platforming puzzles
  • Open-world side-scrolling exploration with towns, inns, shops, and many side-quests
  • Diverse characters and themes created by a queer developer
  • No loot boxes or gambling junk 👏

short_description: Explore a pastel-hued island while uncovering mysteries from the past. Orange Island is an authentic 8-bit action-adventure game with heart.
reviews:
“[...] I was captivated. The music and art-style was so consistent and on-form with its various inspirations that it truly felt like somebody had dug up a lost game from years back and got it running on modern hardware.”
Big Boss Battle
